entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow ending early this afternoon then cloudy. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 11 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 02 February 2023
